Style/EndlessMethod.description:
Description

Avoid the use of multi-lined endless method definitions.
Style/EndlessMethod.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: allow_single_line (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['allow_single_line', 'allow_always', 'disallow', 'require_single_line', 'require_always'] (type: list)
